snippet: National Football League teams are racing this season to secure the title of loudest outdoor stadium in the world, but all that noise can come with a serious cost.
abstract: Auditory experts warn that noise at football games can potentially damage attendees' hearing permanently; National Football League has been encouraging fans to be louder, as NFL teams are competing to secure the title of the loudest outdoor stadium in the world.
lead_paragraph: National Football League teams are racing this season to secure the title of loudest outdoor stadium in the world, but all that noise can come with a serious cost.

headline.main: Ground-Shaking Noise Rocks N.F.L., and Eardrums Take Big Hit
headline.print_headline: Ground-Shaking Noise Rocks N.F.L., and Eardrums Take Big Hit
